query.description: Filter by booking status (pending, confirmed, cancelled)

request.description:
Get all bookings with optional filtering by status, experience ID, or date. Supports filtering for confirmed, pending, or cancelled bookings. Returns populated booking data with experience and user details. Requires admin authentication.

Response format:
{
  "success": true,
  "data": [...bookings],
  "total": number
}

Create a rest/resort booking with integrated NoqoodyPay payment URL. Supports both overnight and day visit bookings with partial or full payment. Returns booking details along with paymentUrl, paymentReference, and paymentMessage for seamless payment processing.

Create horse training booking with multiple appointments and integrated NoqoodyPay payment URL. Supports terms agreement, personal info, and training details. Returns booking details along with paymentUrl, paymentReference, totalAmount, and paymentMessage for seamless payment processing of all training sessions.

Create plant order booking with delivery details and integrated NoqoodyPay payment URL. Supports multiple plants, delivery address, recipient information, and payment details. Returns booking details along with paymentUrl, paymentReference, and paymentMessage for seamless payment processing.
Get available payment channels/services from NoqoodyPay (Credit Card, NAPS, Apple Pay, Google Pay). Public endpoint - no authentication required.
Get NoqoodyPay user settings including project details and available services. Requires admin authentication.
Main payment API - Creates payment order with automatic user management. Finds existing user by phone or creates new one. Generates payment link and stores payment record.

request.description: Example: Create payment for rest/resort booking
Development endpoint - generates a test payment link with NoqoodyPay for testing purposes
Development mock checkout page - Beautiful Arabic interface for payment simulation with success/failure buttons

Verify payment status using payment reference number. Uses official NoqoodyPay validation API: /sdk/api/Members/GetTransactionDetailStatusByClientReference/. Replace 'DIRW-1753367234153' with actual payment reference from booking response. Returns complete transaction details including status, amount, date, and payment method.
Verify payment status with NoqoodyPay API and automatically update booking/payment status in database. Returns updated booking details. Replace 'DIRW-1753374165204' with actual payment reference.
NoqoodyPay webhook endpoint (GET method). Called automatically by NoqoodyPay after payment completion. Revalidates transaction and updates booking status. Set this URL in NoqoodyPay dashboard.
NoqoodyPay webhook endpoint (POST method). Called automatically by NoqoodyPay after payment completion. Accepts reference in request body and updates booking status. Alternative webhook format.

Get available payment channels (Credit Card, Debit Card, PayPal, Google Pay, etc.) using SessionID and UUID from payment link generation. Uses official NoqoodyPay API: /sdk/api/PaymentLink/PaymentChannels. The SessionID and UUID are returned when generating a payment link. Returns array of payment channels with URLs and transaction details.
